name: Adventure Tower - Jumping Heroes
description:
Welcome Jumper!

We would like to invite you to this happy casual jumping game!

That fun 2D game is all about jumping: jump on platforms to move further, jump to avoid traps and finally jump to run from fire !

In our game you can select one of many heroes (some of us could call them monsters) that could help you onto your adventure, for example: elf, golem, warrior, vampire and mage.

Use unique skills of those heroes to bypass different traps and claim the chest at the top of the tower in Campaign or use those abilities to settle in record on global leaderbord in Endless mode!

We've prepared two different game modes:
- Campaign mode where you will travel through different worlds and maps to visit all of our mystical towers from all sort of platforms and sometimes spiked with traps!
- Challenge mode which has never ending set of platforms, you could try your luck in this mode to get on the top of our leaderboard of jump heroes!

In each of those game modes you can suspect to come across different obstacles that will test your skills:
-falling rocks
-exploding barrels
-platform spikes
-magic portals 
-rotating hammers

For each game mode we prepared some achievements that you can check and collect prize for achieving them!

How can you unlock new heroes ?
There are two options to do that:
- gather enough coins while playing Campaign or Endless tower mode

How about maps ?
- You unlock new maps by progressing in campaign mode

Game was made entirely in Unity and it is our first game. We'll be gratefull for any opinions and tips! - those will help in our future projects.
Hope you'll enjoy our game, if you like you could also download mobile version on Google Play Store or iOS App Store.

Controls:
-LEFT/RIGHT arrow key to move left or right
-UP arrow key to jump (hold it to jump constantly)
-SPACE key to use special ability
-ESCAPE key to pause 

Have a great adventure!
